fields.Title: DOOMED / BREAKER BOX
fields.Description:
Doomed cellar, breaker box. DONE. 

Get task finished for locate a fridge if you need to plug the fridge back in.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great. The owners of this building..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great. The owners of this building will just have to keep paying for the electricity sucked up by this monstrosity a little longer. Let's return to the fridge."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Rip the red one out! Look how giant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Rip the red one out! Look how giant and red and inviting it is...

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "Two cables are plugged into the bre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Two cables are plugged into the breaker box. The red one leads off into the darkness, while the black one seems to be feeding a buzzing little fridge-like thing in the corner.

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "Two cables are plugged into the bre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Two cables are plugged into the breaker box. The red one leads to the ice bear fridge and the black one to some kind of a buzzing fridge-like thing nearby.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises his brows, bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant raises his brows, but doesn't say anything. The electric distribution board now has one cable missing.
fields.Alternate1: "Okay. That still doesn't mean you can open the ice cream maker, you know? I bet it's still pretty much impossible..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great. The owners of this building..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great. The owners of this building will just have to keep paying for the electricity sucked up by this monstrosity a little longer."

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "Somewhere in the dark, a giant elec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Somewhere in the dark, a giant electric mammal stirs to life...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very smart. Opening the lid should..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very smart. Opening the lid should be much easier after the ice cream maker has defrosted. But we're still going to need a proper prybar."

fields.Title: You: ""It's black, it's not like it's the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's black, it's not like it's the red one."

fields.Title: You: "Unplug the giant red cable."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unplug the giant red cable.

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "Two cables are plugged into the bre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Two cables are plugged into the breaker box. The red one leads to the ice bear fridge and the black one to the ice cream maker nearby.

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "Only the black cable is plugged int..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Only the black cable is plugged into the breaker box, while the red one lies neglected on the floor.

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "A giant electric mammal awakens. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A giant electric mammal awakens. The dead body is going to be safe in the embrace of its cold innards.

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "Only the red cable is plugged into..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Only the red cable is plugged into the breaker box, while the black one lies neglected on the floor.

fields.Title: You: "Plug in the giant red cable."
fields.Dialogue Text: Plug in the giant red cable.

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "Somewhere a machine hums along with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Somewhere a machine hums along with the current, happy and contented.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very smart. Opening the lid should..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very smart. Opening the lid should be much easier after the ice cream maker has defrosted."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Don't rip the red one out -- you'll..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't rip the red one out -- you'll awaken the ghosts!

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know why I unplugged it, I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know why I unplugged it, I do things without any reason."

fields.Title: You: ""Because it's black, the colour of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because it's black, the colour of immeasurable cosmos."

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "Both cables are unplugged from the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Both cables are unplugged from the breaker box.

fields.Title: You: "Plug in the black cable."
fields.Dialogue Text: Plug in the black cable.

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "Two cables are plugged into the bre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Two cables are plugged into the breaker box. The red one leads off into the darkness and the black one to the ice cream maker nearby.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why did you do that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why did you do that?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uh, what are you doing? We need th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh, what are you doing? We need the fridge for the body, you can't just unplug it." He takes the cable and plugs it back in.

fields.Title: You: "Unplug the black cable."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unplug the black cable.

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "A giant electric mammal awakens. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A giant electric mammal awakens. The dead body is now safe in the embrace of its cold innards.

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "Something close to you dies with a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something close to you dies with a soft electric purr.

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "An electric sizzle! The room is sli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An electric sizzle! The room is slightly quieter now.

fields.Title: Breaker Box: "An electric sizzle! The room is sli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An electric sizzle! The room is slightly quieter now.
